recommendations.title: Reduce dining out expenses
recommendations.description: Cut back on dining out by 20% to allocate more funds towards savings and debt repayment.
recommendations.reasoning: Overspending on dining out has been a consistent trend, and reducing this expense will help allocate more funds towards savings and debt repayment.

recommendations.title: Increase emergency fund contributions
recommendations.description: Aim to save an additional 10% of income towards the emergency fund to ensure 3-6 months' worth of expenses are covered.
recommendations.reasoning: The user's emergency fund is below the recommended level, and increasing contributions will provide a safety net during market volatility.

recommendations.title: Rebalance investment portfolio
recommendations.description: Rebalance the investment portfolio to maintain an optimal asset allocation, reducing exposure to high-risk assets.
recommendations.reasoning: The current portfolio is overweighted in high-risk assets, and rebalancing will help minimize losses during market downturns.
